title: @Riot please address this I am just asking for clarification
body:
Hello Riot, I know you have a lot of requests to unban accounts, and that's not what this is, I do not have an account ban I have a chat ban which is fine I don't want it unban I just want an explanation what I said that is considered toxic, and I'm confused as to why, if I was toxic I own it and will gladly submit to the ban.

 I got a chat ban for trying to explain to a player how them stealing farm from our adc (not me) when our adc asked them nicely was considered griefing, the enemy team was asking us what was going on so I let them know that our Vayne and Sona were being toxic to each other and trolling each other, (as our vayne ran in inting for a while till she started trying to get kills so as not to get detected, then ran mid taking our midlaners farm after sona would not stop aaing and stealing farm.) I didn't cuss at them, I didn't call them bad, I asked them nicely to stop and just try and play the game while talking with the other team about what was going on. 

So riot this is the third time this has happened, and each ban has only been over one game not multiple games like most reform cards. Why am I getting chat bans when I don't cuss at the players, don't call them bad in any fashion, try to help them and give them advice like on item builds, warding or mias, I don't tell them to kys or anything like that. 
At worst I try to explain to them why an item is good like thornmail in to an all ad team while they tell me stfu and kys. If I am chat ban because I continue to try and give them advice and work together like a team after they tell me to stfu then I understand. Also why are they not ban for telling me to kys, cussing me out, telling me to stfu, inting, or trolling my jungle?

I just want clarification as to if explaining things to players in a factual non offensive matter after they say stfu is considered toxic behavior so I can avoid it in the future. Also why am I not getting emails with my reform card, why can't I copy and paste it from client to here so that I can show you exactly what was said and why is no one replying to my ticket on this subject. 

Sorry for the long winded post Riot but I really just want clarification.

replies.body: Post the logs and someone on the boards can help see if something you said was toxic.

I gladly would but they haven't emailed them to me and it won't let me copy paste, that was part of the problem, I can screen shot them and thats about it but I'm not sure how to post pictures on here.

I think you might have to upload it somewhere and then post the link. But i'm not exactly sure either.

Humm, thanks for the help, I likely won't upload the pics I don't really want to create an account to photo share just for this, and it was more directed at riot to answer than players. 

I realize players will call me a liar and that's fine I believe in the right of their free speech, and stand and fight for it daily. Also I can not prove my innocence so I do not expect anyone to believe me, this is just directed at riot because I wanted clarification from them specifically as to what I said that was breaking the rules. 

For those suggesting how to help thank you I really appreciate you, it's people like you that make this community and world a better place being helpful instead of insulting.

I know from experience that Riot's banning system is quite iffy. Seems like a lot of people suffer the same thing too.

Anyway, good luck. {{sticker:sg-ahri-2}}
Thanks man! You're awesome made me smile! Have a great day!

If you need to talk to Riot specifically the only way to guarantee that is to make a support ticket. Also, Riot no longer sends emails for punishments (a red said that on the forums a few times a while back).

Ah, well thank you, for all your help I'll just wait out the chat ban, to be honest I likely won't ever use the chat to communicate again just stick to discord, everything that needs to be said can be said with a ping, its sad that you have to be afraid to use the chat to communicate with your team now days.
